verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* Maeleth, understandings \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w The|strong="H1732"\w* fool said \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart: There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no God.

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* corrupted, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* become abominable \w in|strong="H0935"\w* iniquities: there \w is|strong="H1004"\w* none \w that|strong="H0559"\w* doth good.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* looked down \w from|strong="H3117"\w* heaven \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*: \w to|strong="H3117"\w* see if \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* understand, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* seek \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

All \w have|strong="H2803"\w* gone aside, \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* become unprofitable together, there \w is|strong="H3956"\w* none \w that|strong="H3956"\w* doth good, no not \w one|strong="H3956"\w*.

Shall not all \w the|strong="H0157"\w* workers \w of|strong="H1696"\w* iniquity know, \w who|strong="H6664"\w* eat up \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H7451"\w* eat bread?

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* not called upon God: \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* trembled \w for|strong="H3605"\w* fear, where \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* fear. \w For|strong="H3605"\w* God hath scattered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bones \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H0157"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* please \w men|strong="H3605"\w*: \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* confounded, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* God hath despised \w them|strong="H0157"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0410"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H2416"\w* out \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sion \w the|strong="H1571"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Israel? \w when|strong="H0776"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* bring back \w the|strong="H1571"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w*, Jacob \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* rejoice, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Israel \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* glad.
